name: Winetender
description:
Dash around a busy wine hall and deliver wine to thirsty customers. Don't forget to dodge the waiter!

This is a simple 2d arcade style game made for the

Weekend Crazy Jam 3

Credits

Programming and game design - Adam Street

Music - zagi2 (username from freesound.org)

Sound effects - mickleness / shinephoenixstormcrow (usernames from freesound.org)
